text.headline: Letters from Pauline Smith to Christine Smith December 12, 1938.
text.text: From the Ellard-Murphree-Pilgreen-Smith Family Papers Collection. Pauline writes about Christine's and other's health. She also discusses other social and family matters and includes a letter from Martha.
